summary.title: Fix next_id to return smallest unused ID instead of max+1
summary.description: The previous implementation returned max(existing_ids) + 1, which could lead to duplicate IDs when IDs have gaps (e.g., due to deletions). Changed next_id to find the smallest unused positive integer.

risks.performance_impact: minimal - O(n) where n is max ID, but for small todo lists this is negligible
